name: Road Runner (itch) (Charlie Cat, Saridos)
description:
You. have. way. too. many. friends.

All you want is some alone time. But you aren't even alone at night. You decide to run away from all your friends just for a moment of time to yourself. 

Can you dodge all the dangers between you and alone time?

Sorry, there is no WebGL it's definitely the easiest way to play but I got errors when I tried to export. I'm also sorry there's no Linux, next time I will learn how to upload Linux.
